title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post More info: Writing Run server More info: Server Generate static files More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites More info: Deployment

title: wagtail手机搭建
content: 1 安装termux2更新一下termux $pkg update3更换termux源 $termux-change-repo $sed -i ‘s@^(deb.*stable main)$@#\1\ndeb  stable main@’ $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list $apt update && apt upgrad4安装Python及换源 $pkg install pythonpip换源 $pip config set global.index-url 用 pip config list来查看你换的源 安装wagtail 23:26:49 安装库：$pip install wagtail 初始化项目：$wagtail start mysite 进入目录：$cd mysite 安装依赖：$pip install -r requirements.txt 初始化数据库：$python manage.py migrate 新建超级管理员：$ 启动项目：$ 安装库 初始化项目 进入目录 安装依赖 初始化 新建超级管理员 启动
